00020         public static IQueryable<Order> getOrdersByUser(int userID, HttpResponse r)
00021         {
00022             IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00023 
00024             IQueryable<Order> orders_User = null;
00025 
00026             if (Security.IsAuthorized(userID, PwasObject.Order, PwasAction.View, PwasScope.All))
00027             {
00028                 orders_User = from p
00029                               in orderRepository.Orders
00030                               select p;
00031             }
00032             else if (Security.IsAuthorized(userID, PwasObject.Order, PwasAction.View, PwasScope.Self))
00033             {
00034                 orders_User = from p
00035                               in orderRepository.Orders
00036                               where p.userID == userID
00037                               select p;
00038             }
00039             else
00040             {
00041                 r.Redirect("index.aspx");
00042             }
00043             return orders_User;
00044         }
00045 
00046         public static Status getCurrentOrderStatus(int orderID)
00047         {
00048             IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00049             IStatusRepository statusReposiory = RepositoryFactory.Get<IStatusRepository>();
00050 
00051             Order currentOrder = orderRepository.GetById(orderID);
00052 
00053             int tempStatus = (int)currentOrder.currentStatus;
00054 
00055             Status currentStatus = statusReposiory.GetById(tempStatus);
00056 
00057             return currentStatus;
00058         }
00059 
00060         public static string getCurrentOrderStatusDate(int orderID)
00061         {
00062             IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00063             IOrderHistoryRepository historyRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderHistoryRepository>();
00064 
00065             Order currentOrder = orderRepository.GetById(orderID);
00066             //OrderHistory currentHistory = historyRepository.OrderHistories.Single(x => x.orderId == orderID 
00067              //                                                    && x.statusId == currentOrder.Status.statusId);
00068             OrderHistory currentHistory = (from history in historyRepository.OrderHistories
00069                                            where history.orderId == orderID && history.statusId == currentOrder.currentStatus
00070                                            orderby history.modifiedDate descending
00071                                            select history).First();
00072 
00073             return currentHistory.modifiedDate.ToString();
00074         }
00075

00077         {
00078             return "100 $us";

00082         internal static bool isMyOrder(int orderID, int userID)
00083         {            
00084             IOrderRepository orderRepository = RepositoryFactory.Get<IOrderRepository>();
00085             Order currentOrder = orderRepository.GetById(orderID);
00086 
00087             if (currentOrder.userID == userID)
00088                 return true;
00089             else
00090                 return false;           
00091         }
00092     }
